dataset_fields.label: Organization
dataset_fields.help_text: Select the organization for which you manage this dataset.

dataset_fields.label: Data set name
dataset_fields.help_text: The following scheme should be used (optional elements, indicated in square brackets): "Original Title of the resource (in English) - [Location] - [Acronym] - [Year] [Resource owner/provider, in brackets]". Be concise, using optional elements when they help to better identify a specific resource among similar ones. Example: "Fisheries sectors - Southern Adriatic Sea - GSA - 2015 (FAO)".

dataset_fields.label: Discipline
dataset_fields.help_text: e.g Physical oceanography

dataset_fields.label: Parameters group
dataset_fields.help_text: e.g Waves

dataset_fields.label: Discovery parameter
dataset_fields.help_text: EOV or ECV in the dataset

dataset_fields.label: GEMET-INSPIRE themes
dataset_fields.help_text: EOV or ECV in the dataset

dataset_fields.label: Abstract
dataset_fields.help_text: Describe in a few sentences the content and the purpose of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Data format
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: one or more formats in which the data is available (e.g. csv, netcdf)

dataset_fields.label: Resource language
dataset_fields.help_text: Language of the dataset as found, for example, in attribute tables for geospatial datasets or in text for documents.

dataset_fields.label: Domain area
dataset_fields.help_text: Geographical area covered or representative of the dataset. (Please start typing to search).

dataset_fields.label: Data originator
dataset_fields.help_text: This is a list of one or more names (e.g. EMODnet, EEA, Eurostat) identifying the ownership of the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Data custodian
dataset_fields.help_text: This is a list of one or more names (e.g. EMODnet, EEA, Eurostat) identifying the provider of the resource. E. g. This could be the owner of the geo-portal or SDI through which the resource is available.

dataset_fields.label: Data portal
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: eg. ADRIPLAN, SHAPE, EMODNet Human activities
dataset_fields.help_text: Portal where the dataset is published/downloadable/etc. (if any).

dataset_fields.label: Presentation form
dataset_fields.help_text: Select the value from the list which is closer to the type of structure and presentation form of the dataset.

choices.label: Map (map represented in raster or vector form)

dataset_fields.label: Spatial representation
dataset_fields.help_text: In case of geospatial information, select the specific type of spatial representation from the list; if the dataset has no geospatial coomponent, select "No geo".

choices.label: epsg:41001 WGS84 / Simple Mercator -- Spherical Mercator

dataset_fields.help_text: Identifier of the coordinate reference system(s) used in the data set. Only identifiers contained in the EPSG Geodetic Parameter Dataset shall be used (e.g. 4326). Refer to the following URLs for more info and to find the proper EPSG code: epsg.io or spatialreference.org.
Available interoperable services to view or download the resource.

dataset_fields.label: Derives from
dataset_fields.help_text: If this dataset derives (as a subset, elaboration, derived product, ...) from another dataset already present in the catalogue, select that dataset in this field.

dataset_fields.label: Successor of
dataset_fields.help_text: Select related datasets

dataset_fields.label: Temporal extent
dataset_fields.help_text: Time period covered by the content of the dataset. Use this field to specify ad individual date or to specify the START date of a time period.
Use this field in combination with the previous one to specify the END date of a time period.

dataset_fields.label: Spatial extent
dataset_fields.help_text: GeoJSON feature

dataset_fields.label: Data accessibility
dataset_fields.form_placeholder: A description of the level of resource accessibility.
dataset_fields.help_text: Indicate whether and how the dataset is accessible (visible, downloadable, sent on request, not accessible, etc.) Add information to explain limitations and restrictions to access or use. Use this field alone or to supplement the 'Licence' field.

dataset_fields.label: License
dataset_fields.help_text: If the dataset has an explicit license associated, select it form the list. If useful, use the filed "Data accessibility" to add/specify details regarding the license.

dataset_fields.label: Additional information
dataset_fields.help_text: Add here any information you consider useful to better describe the dataset or to integrate the information present in the abstract.

resource_fields.label: Resource type
resource_fields.help_text: Select from the list the type of resource.

resource_fields.label: Source
resource_fields.help_text: If you refer to a resource already available elsewhere, use 'Link' to add the URL where it is accessible. Otherwise, you can upload the resource directly to the catalogue via 'Upload'.

resource_fields.label: Name
resource_fields.form_placeholder: A descriptive short name for the resource

resource_fields.label: Description
resource_fields.help_text: Brief description of the resource (e.g. content of a document or of a web page, description of all relevant attribute fields for a geospatial dataset, ...).
resource_fields.form_placeholder: Some useful notes about the data

resource_fields.label: Format
resource_fields.help_text: Please select the format of the data resouce, e.g. wms, wfs, html, ecc. (for web pages, inclung mapviewers).
